review: This is a great gadget. Bought it when Amazon was selling it "pre-ordered" for $19.00. The speed is awesome for such a small gadget. The wireless speed is amazing... My TV (Sony) has built-in wireless (very crappy) this gadget is at least 4 to 5 times faster. Movies never chop or lag. TV is on a different floor, and about two additional walls away. Wireless speed is awesome.HERE IS WHY I WONT GIVE IT A 5 STARS... even though it deserves it.... The bigger brother has a voice search feature that is second to none. WELL... Amazon can sell you the remote SEPARATELY for this unit... why not offer a model with a voice search equipped remote for a few extra dollars.I must also point out that I don't care much for the voice remote search, but my wife and kids really like it. I might have to buy it for an additional $20.00 to $30.00 (I think)Highly recommended. Very fast. The cover flow when showing the movies cover is the smoothest I have seen.
author: Ralph Montague "R. Montague"
